attributes.action: Calls for tougher sentences to people who defraud pensioners whilst acting as workmen
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition for a call to tougher sentences to people who commit crimes against pensioners whilst acting as bogus workmen. They should also be made to payback there victims of all money that they took, or stripped of there assets to recuperate the loses of there victims. These people prey on the vulnerable and should be dealt with harder
